trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken" /> 安全令牌进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.RsaSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.RsaSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的安全令牌是否可由该安全令牌身份验证器进行验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when <paramref name="token" /> is a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken" /> security token; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 为 <paramref name="token" /> 安全令牌，则为 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
trans-unit.target: 对指定的安全令牌进行身份验证，并返回该安全令牌的授权策略集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy" /> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy" />，它包含对此应用程序生效的授权策略集。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method is called on the authorization policy that is returned from this method, a claim of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Rsa%2A> is added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> that is passed into the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果对从该方法返回的授权策略调用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> 方法，则会将一个 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Rsa%2A> 类型的声明添加到被传递到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> 方法中的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> 的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> 属性。
